title: Meat Your Maker!
name: Meat Your Maker!
description:
A Map by Madamegonzaga

Restaurateurs, chefs, und fiends hooo mayke good meats! Zeez map eez dessicateded tou Becky, ze Goddess ov Tri-Tip.

properties.name: Alfred's Steakhouse
properties.description: Posted by Madamegonzaga659 Merchant Street, San Francisco CANow under ze ownership ov ze deefrunt Alfred zen ze original, still boasts ze tastiest stakes in ze kingdom. Cattiecombs downstairs!

properties.name: Everett & Jones
properties.description: Posted by Wickedone126 Broadway, Oakland CA 94607Yummy, yummy BBQ, full bar, sometimes entertainment

properties.name: House of Prime Rib
properties.description: Posted by Madamegonzaga 1906 Van Ness Ave, San Francisco, CAAryooo lyke ze meats zat melt in yore mouth? Mee tooo!

properties.name: Karla ov Cafe La Taza
properties.description: Posted by Madamegonzaga  470 Post Street, San Francisco CA 94102 Ze pulled pork panini wif chipotle mayonnaise eez ze way tou goose. Add ze iced mocha, ze cookie, und mebbe ze leetl Caesar salad und aryooo veal bee ze happy camper. Nice barista, efficient service, clean, gut tasty meats. Iced mocha ze vay Goose intendeded.

properties.name: Lam ov Tu Lan Restaurant
properties.description: Posted by Madamegonzaga   8 Sixth Street, San Francisco CA Lam Phung, ze unassuming waiter at Tu Lan Restaurant, brightened palpitatinglyish when axed tou bee een ze Madame\'s moobie! Hee blossoms lyke ze flower und heez smile eez as goode az ze Vietnamese iced cafffffeeeeeeeeeine zat I fluff so muchly. Zeez place eez ze favrit ov San Franciscans. Und zare eez ze secret staircase! Hoo wood haf known? Knot eye. Mein favrit drunxxxen chef, Julia Child fluffed zeez place, und wif gut reason! Tell Lam I said "Halllllllow!" when aryoooo veezit. (Special donkeys tou mein fiend Wendy Allen ov Fat Chance Belly Dance fur agreeking tou co-star in ze leetl moobie.)

properties.name: Luciano ov Schroeder's Cafe
properties.description: Posted by Madamegonzaga   240 Front Street, San Francisco CAOx Tail eez lyke crack! Goot strawlberrry desserties, tooo. But ze veddy beast ting abooot Schroeder\'s eez ze dapper handsome gentleman in ze suit, Luciano. Tell heem ze Madame sent aryooooo! Might I suggest ze osso bucco? Tummy fluff! Injoy ze Fine Bavarian Food wifout ze exorbitant airfare!

properties.name: Pedro ov Brazil Fresh Squeeze Cafe
properties.description: Posted by Madamegonzaga  2161 University Avenue, Berkeley, CA Pedro\'s meats ar ze best in all ze Land! Tri-tip! I fluff gettinks ze snakkings und chatties as I wait in line. Mango Smoooooothies! Yip! Yip! Transport yore elf tou meatweirld wif ze mouth-watering goodness ov melt-in-ze-mouth meats. Tastiest meats in ze Bay Area. I ham jonesin\'! Aryooo hear meee? Jonesin\'! for more ov ze saucy goodness. Eevin ze veggies were choice.

properties.name: Plutos
properties.description: Posted by Mcmcilvoy 627 Irving St, San Francisco, CAI go here for the plate of meat. I\'m pretty sure you had a salad.

properties.name: Rosamunde Sausage Grill
properties.description: Posted by Fritz 545 Haight St, San Francisco, CA

properties.name: Sami Sunchild ov San Francisco's Red Victorian Bed, Breakfast & Peace Arts Cafe
properties.description: Posted by Madamegonzaga    1665 Haight Street, San Francisco CA Sami Sunchild eez not ze flower chylde mourning ze end ov ze Summer ov Fluff, shee eez ze visionary hoo wants tou lead ze weirld to peace through tourism und travel ov each nation\'s peoples. Veeziting herr B&B eez lyke having ze dinings wif your favrit auntie. Shee veal poot aryooo to work if help eez needed und shee veal sit und chat if shee hath ze moment. Butt shee alvays vants tou ensure your comfort und whilst shee eez doing zat she veal plant ze seeds ov love und peace inside aryooo wifout your even noticing until later. Get a dose ov Sami next time aryooo veezit ze Haight. ZE TOMATOE PIE EEZ TOU DYE FUR!!!!!!!!!! Best. Pie. Ever. Paws down.

properties.name: Sergio ov Fruitful Grounds
properties.description: Posted by Madamegonzaga   1813 Fulton Street, San Francisco CA Sergio, owner ov ze Fruitful Grounds, eez ze kyndely und efficient gentleman hoo nose heez beans! Zeez vun kin mayketh ze iced mocha, grill your burgher, or mayketh your fruity dreeenkie nice und smoooooooth. Best burger in ze Panhandle! Mushrooooms und swiss on myne, please. Vun thyme I gottsa ze turkey burger my mistake, und let mee telll aryooo, zat fuxxxer rockeded! Kizmet! Say, did aryooo nose aryoo kin allso get ze beer, whines, und hard cider heer? Yip Yip! CONSISTENTLY DELICIOUS MOCHAS UND BURGERS...NEVER ZE "OFF" DAY. MADAME GONZAGA GIVES FRUITFUL GROUNDS FOUR PAWLS UPPINKS!

properties.name: Suppenkuche
properties.description: Posted by Fritz 525 Laguna Street, San Francisco, CA

properties.name: Ze Changs ov KK Cafe
properties.description: Posted by Madamegonzaga  252 Divisadero Street, San Francisco CA Even afore ze pea nutty miracle elixir "Signs und Wonders" was discovereded acause ov Jack\'s achin\' gums, I injoyed ze tummyfluff I felt when veeziting Margaret und Jack\'s happy nest. Ze hamburgles ar tasty und easy on ze pocketbooxxx! Allso, zay donut mynde ze wee doggings hoo always bee sniffinings at zare door. So aryooo kin imagine mein delightings when zay discufffered ze fountain ov youth on top ov their allredeye mouth-watering line-up ov ze snaxxx. Vun hamburgle und ze miracle, coming uppinks!
